data.eml:eml: Notes on the extinct family Protapioceridae, with description of a new species from China (Insecta: Diptera: Asiloidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Kuiyan, Yang, Ding, Ren, Dong (2007): Notes on the extinct family Protapioceridae, with description of a new species from China (Insecta: Diptera: Asiloidea). Zootaxa 1530: 27-32, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177713
